body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/contractService/types/" xmlns:con="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/contractService/" xmlns:head="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/header/flex/header/" xmlns:par="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/parties/flex/partyContact/" xmlns:par1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/parties/flex/party/" xmlns:lin="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/flex/contracts/coreAuthoring/lines/" xmlns:con1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/projects/billing/contracts/contractPublicService/" xmlns:con2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/projects/billing/contracts/contractBillingService/" xmlns:bil="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/projects/billing/contracts/flex/BilllPlanDff/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <typ:createContract>
            <typ:contractHeader>
                <con:OrgId>300000046987012</con:OrgId>
                <con:LegalEntityId>300000046973970</con:LegalEntityId>
                <con:ContractTypeId>300000243627185</con:ContractTypeId>
                <con:PartyId>100000000395788</con:PartyId>
                <con:ContractNumber>Akash100</con:ContractNumber>
                <con:Cognomen>Using SOAP</con:Cognomen>
                <con:CurrencyCode>USD</con:CurrencyCode>
                <con:StartDate>2022-01-01</con:StartDate>
                <con:EndDate>2025-01-01</con:EndDate>
                <con:OutputTaxClassificationCode>STD</con:OutputTaxClassificationCode>
                <con:TaxExemptionControlMeaning>Standard</con:TaxExemptionControlMeaning>
                <con:Risk_c>RISK_MEDIUM</con:Risk_c>
                
                <!-- <con:ContributionPercent>1</con:ContributionPercent>
                <con:BillSequence>5</con:BillSequence>
                <con:CustomerPONumber>4556</con:CustomerPONumber>
                <con:BillingSalesrepName>Helena Sprague</con:BillingSalesrepName>
                <con:OwningOrgName>Accounting HC US</con:OwningOrgName>
                <con:InvTrxTypeName>JV Invoice</con:InvTrxTypeName>
                <con:NetInvoiceFlag>true</con:NetInvoiceFlag>
                <con:UnderMigrationFlag>false</con:UnderMigrationFlag>
                <con:GeneratedInvoiceStatus>D</con:GeneratedInvoiceStatus> -->
                <!--BILLING HEADER DETAILS END-->
                <!-- <con:BillingControl>
                    <con1:BillingResource>Equipment</con1:BillingResource>
                    <con1:StartDate>2023-01-01</con1:StartDate>
                    <con1:EndDate>2023-05-01</con1:EndDate>
                    <con1:SoftLimitAmount currencyCode="USD">50000</con1:SoftLimitAmount>
                    <con1:HardLimitAmount currencyCode="USD">35000</con1:HardLimitAmount>
                </con:BillingControl> -->
                <!--BILLING CONTROLS HEADER DETAILS ENDS-->
                <!--PARTIES ACCOUNTS DETAILS-->
                <!-- <con:BillToAccountNumber>80010</con:BillToAccountNumber>
                <con:BillToSiteUseLocation>Manchester</con:BillToSiteUseLocation>
                <con:ShipToAccountNumber>80010</con:ShipToAccountNumber>??
                <con:ShipToSiteUseLocation>Clearwater</con:ShipToSiteUseLocation>
                <con:SoldToAccountNumber>80010</con:SoldToAccountNumber>
                <con:SoldToNumber>58231</con:SoldToNumber>
                <con:ShipInvOrg>Marseille</con:ShipInvOrg> -->
                <!--PARTIES ACCOUNTS DETAILS END-->
                <con:ContractLine>
                    <con:LineNumber>1</con:LineNumber>
                    <con:LineTypeId>300000000099381</con:LineTypeId>
                    <!-- <con:JtotObject1Code>USER_FREE_FORM_PROJECT_BASED</con:JtotObject1Code> -->
                    <con:ItemNameTxt>My Line 1</con:ItemNameTxt>
                    <con:ItemDescription>Description 1</con:ItemDescription>
                    <!-- <con:StsCode>DRAFT</con:StsCode> -->
                    <con:StartDate>2022-12-01</con:StartDate>
                    <con:LineValueAmount currencyCode="USD">850000</con:LineValueAmount>
                </con:ContractLine>
            </typ:contractHeader>
        </typ:createContract>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/contractService/types/" xmlns:con="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/contractService/" xmlns:head="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/header/flex/header/" xmlns:par="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/parties/flex/partyContact/" xmlns:par1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/contracts/coreAuthoring/parties/flex/party/" xmlns:lin="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/flex/contracts/coreAuthoring/lines/" xmlns:con1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/projects/billing/contracts/contractPublicService/" xmlns:con2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/projects/billing/contracts/contractBillingService/" xmlns:bil="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/projects/billing/contracts/flex/BilllPlanDff/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <typ:mergeContract>
            <typ:contractHeader>
                <con:Id>300000258465736</con:Id>
                <con:MajorVersion>2</con:MajorVersion>
                <con:OrgId>300000046987012</con:OrgId>
                <con:BillPlan>
                    <con1:MajorVersion>2</con1:MajorVersion>
                    <con1:BillMethodId>300000047569121</con1:BillMethodId>
                    <con1:BillMethodName>Amount Based</con1:BillMethodName>
                    <con1:BillPlanName>Akash using SOAP</con1:BillPlanName>
                    <con1:InvoiceCurrencyOptCode>CONTRACT</con1:InvoiceCurrencyOptCode>
                    <con1:BillingCurrencyType>Contract</con1:BillingCurrencyType>
                    <con1:PaymentTermsId>300000047311514</con1:PaymentTermsId>
                    <con1:PaymentTerms>2/10, Net 30</con1:PaymentTerms>
                    <con1:BillSetNumber>1</con1:BillSetNumber>
                    <con1:BillToCustomerAccountId>300000047394588</con1:BillToCustomerAccountId>
                    <con1:BillToAccountNumber>80010</con1:BillToAccountNumber>
                    <con1:BillToSiteUseId>300000047394592</con1:BillToSiteUseId>
                    <con1:BillToSite>Clearwater</con1:BillToSite>
                    <con1:BillingCycleId>300000181137504</con1:BillingCycleId>
                    <con1:BillingCycle>Always Eligible</con1:BillingCycle>
                    <con1:LaborInvoiceFormatId>300000230805856</con1:LaborInvoiceFormatId>
                    <con1:LaborInvoiceFormat>Cont Line Labor Type</con1:LaborInvoiceFormat>
                    <con1:NlInvoiceFormatId>300000230805859</con1:NlInvoiceFormatId>
                    <con1:NonlaborInvoiceFormat>Cont Line Non Labor Type</con1:NonlaborInvoiceFormat>
                    <con1:EventsInvoiceFormatId>300000230805854</con1:EventsInvoiceFormatId>
                    <con1:EventInvoiceFormat>Cont Line Event Type</con1:EventInvoiceFormat>
                    <con1:OnHoldFlag>false</con1:OnHoldFlag>
                </con:BillPlan>
            </typ:contractHeader>
        </typ:mergeContract>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
